LanguageData.OGI_Wargear_CombatShield.label: Combat Shield
LanguageData.OGI_Wargear_CombatShield.description: Shield made from a Xenomorph head. It protects the wearer from both melee and ranged attacks, and is immune to the acidic effect of the Xenomorph's blood.
LanguageData.OGI_Wargear_CombatShield.tools.0.label: side
LanguageData.OGI_Wargear_CombatShield.tools.1.label: buckle
